ROW.DATDSC: SELECT A.YY, A.MM, A.DD, A.PCH, A.PZLX, B.PZH || A.STR_PZH STR_PZH, A.ZY, DECODE(A.JEFX, '借', A.JE, 0) JFJE, DECODE(A.JEFX, '贷', A.JE, 0) DFJE, A.YEFX, A.YE, A.JSFS, A.DJH, A.LSH, A.DYLSH, A.DWBH, A.DWMC FROM CW_RJZB A,CW_PZB B WHERE A.SBH = '[%SBH]' AND A.ZTH = '[%ZTH]' AND A.YY = '[%YYYY]' AND A.MM = '[%MM]' AND B.PZH = '[%PZH]' AND A.KMBH = '[%KMBH]' AND A.SBH = B.SBH AND A.ZTH = B.ZTH AND A.PZH = B.CZXH [%FILTER] ORDER BY QCBZ DESC, SXH, LSH

SELECT nvl("CW_RJLXB"."RJLX","CW_RJZMXB"."KMBH") rjlx, nvl("CW_RJLXMXB"."KXMC","CW_KMB"."KMMC") kxmc, "CW_RJZMXB"."YM1", "CW_RJZMXB"."YM2", "CW_RJZMXB"."JE", "CW_RJZMXB"."JEFX", "CW_RJZMXB".SBH SBH, "CW_RJZMXB".ZTH ZTH, "CW_RJZMXB"."LSH", "CW_RJZMXB"."LXBH", "CW_RJZMXB"."LXXH" FROM "CW_RJZMXB", "CW_RJLXMXB", "CW_RJLXB", "CW_KMB" WHERE ("CW_RJZMXB"."ORG" = '[%SYS_ORGID]') AND ("CW_RJZMXB"."ACC" = '[%SYS_ACCID]') AND ("CW_RJZMXB"."LSH" = '[%LSH]') AND ("CW_KMB"."ORG"(+) = '[%SYS_ORGID]') AND ("CW_KMB"."ACC"(+) = '[%SYS_ACCID]') AND ("CW_KMB"."KMBH"(+) = "CW_RJZMXB"."KMBH") AND ("CW_RJLXMXB"."ORG"(+) = '[%SYS_ORGID]') AND ("CW_RJLXMXB"."ACC"(+) = '[%SYS_ACCID]') AND ("CW_RJLXMXB"."LXBH"(+) = "CW_RJZMXB"."LXBH") AND ("CW_RJLXMXB"."MXXH"(+) = "CW_RJZMXB"."LXXH") AND ("CW_RJLXB"."ORG"(+) = '[%SYS_ORGID]') AND ("CW_RJLXB"."ACC"(+) = '[%SYS_ACCID]') AND ("CW_RJLXB"."LXBH"(+) = "CW_RJLXMXB"."LXBH") ORDER BY "CW_RJZMXB"."LSH", "CW_RJZMXB"."MXXH"
